snippet: Instagram is in a position to help Facebook at the lucrative crossroads of pictures and mobile devices. Pictures are enormously important for Facebook, but it is not so easy to post a picture that you've taken on a cellphone onto your Facebook page...
abstract: Instagram is in a position to help Facebook at the lucrative crossroads of pictures and mobile devices. Pictures are enormously important for Facebook, but it is not so easy to post a picture that you've taken on a cellphone onto your Facebook page from a mobile device. And cellphones are what we use these days to take pictures.

headline.main: Facebook Makes a Play for Mobile With Its Instagram Scoop
